products.title: Treviso Shadow Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their amazing treviso blind range is available in 6 on trend colours that complement the beautiful tree pattern. This grey roller blind has an eye-catching tree pattern and a metallic finish which will add style and elegance to any room in your home. The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for difficult to reach windows.
